articles.author: Jeff Mason, Bart Meijer, David Brunnstrom
articles.description: Trump began telling trade partners - from powerhouse suppliers like Japan and South Korea to minor players - that sharply higher U.S. tariffs will start August 1, marking a new phase in the trade war he launched earlier this year.
articles.title: Japan, South Korea face 25% tariffs as Trump ramps up trade war in letters to leaders
